Posts.Content: I too have had the same treatment as you,also x1 microscopic deposit in first sentinel lymph node .25 mm.My oncologist say I have to have a scan post completion of radiation n then yearly,hope this helps.also tell your oncologist you take on board his opinion but for your peace of mind you want a scan, if he still refuses go somewhere else.
